snippet.title: Soulslinger: Envoy of Death - Official Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Blast through enemies and see action-packed gameplay in this trailer for Soulslinger: Envoy of Death, an upcoming rogue-lite action FPS game heading to Early Access in 2023. 

As a gunslinger trapped in Limbo, you are entangled in a gritty war against The Cartel, a ruthless organization harvesting souls to break free of the shackles of the afterlife. But as you grow stronger with each new run, the real nightmare in this world is you. Shoot your way to freedom and utilize the essence of lost souls to take on the biggest threats.

#IGN #Gaming
